item.title: Hi, there
item.description: Hi, there My name is Benjamin Mezger1 and I am one of many software engineers lost in a world of code and numbers. In day job, I work on a large Python E-commerce code-base with Django and Wagtail on a team of 7 software engineers. Iâ€™m interested in computer security, operating systems, and computer architecture. I enjoy this field so much, I developed a Microkernel for the RISC-V ISA for my Bachelor thesis.
